************
Installation
************

Shadow follows PSR-0 standard,

Via Composer
============

Add this code to your ``composer.json``

.. code-block:: json

    "require": {
		"lokesh/shadow": "dev-master"
	}

Requirements
------------

PHP >= 5.0
GD Image Library

Dependency Libraries
--------------------

imagine/imagine
sabre/xml
skyzyx/adobe-swatch-exchange
sybio/gif-creator
